channel.title: Nfc on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Nfc on Joost Plattel

item.title: iPhone XS NFC Shortcuts
item.description: I’ve recently gotten a new iPhone and with it some more stuff to tinker with. And one of those things is the ability to read NFC tags natively. Following the rabbit hole I ended up ordering a NFC reader. Albeit a simple one, it turns out it is flexible enought to read most cards and write some as well (and more if you have some time to spend..)
